page.title: 14SCHOOL DAY
page.content: The school day begins at nine o'clock. Children enter their classroom so that registration can take place. Assemblies commence at twenty past ten, continuing until playtime at twenty to eleven. The second part of the morning lasts from five to eleven till mid-day. Language, Mathematics and Reading normally take place during the morning session, but interests or special happenings very often alter the programme of the morning's work. Lunch is from mid-day until one o'clock. Afternoon school ends at three o'clock for the Infants and half an hour later for the Juniors, with a fifteen minute break at a quarter past two.
